co.cask.tigon.internal.app.runtime
Interface ProgramController.Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractListener
Enclosing interface:
ProgramController
public static interface ProgramController.Listener

Listener for getting callbacks on state changed on ProgramController.
